languages.text: "Интересно... Так вот как поступает владыка миров и всех звезд на небе, когда встречает несчастного на пороге своего благополучия". {n}Джай задумчиво кивает и подзывает следующую просительницу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Интересно... Так вот как поступает владыка миров и всех звезд на небе, когда встречает несчастного на пороге своего благополучия". {n}Джай задумчиво кивает и подзывает следующую просительницу.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Interesting... So that is how the ruler of worlds and all the stars in the sky acts when {mf|he|she} finds an unfortunate on the edge of {mf|his|her} magnificent orbit." {n}Jae nods pensively and beckons the next petitioner forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Interesting... So that is how the ruler of worlds and all the stars in the sky acts when {mf|he|she} finds an unfortunate on the edge of {mf|his|her} magnificent orbit." {n}Jae nods pensively and beckons the next petitioner forward.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “真有趣……当无数世界与群星的统治者发现不幸之人游荡在{mf|他|她}华丽的星轨边缘时，原来{mf|他|她}会做出这样的决定。”{n}婕伊若有所思地点了点头，招手让下一个请愿者走上前来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Interesting... So that is how the ruler of worlds and all the stars in the sky acts when {mf|he|she} finds an unfortunate on the edge of {mf|his|her} magnificent orbit." {n}Jae nods pensively and beckons the next petitioner forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “真有趣……当无数世界与群星的统治者发现不幸之人游荡在{mf|他|她}华丽的星轨边缘时，原来{mf|他|她}会做出这样的决定。”{n}婕伊若有所思地点了点头，招手让下一个请愿者走上前来。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Interesante... de modo que así es como {mf|el|la} gobernante de mundos y todas las estrellas del cielo actúa cuando encuentra a un desdichado al borde de su magnífica órbita». {n}Jae asiente, pensativa, e indica al siguiente solicitante que avance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Interesting... So that is how the ruler of worlds and all the stars in the sky acts when {mf|he|she} finds an unfortunate on the edge of {mf|his|her} magnificent orbit." {n}Jae nods pensively and beckons the next petitioner forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Interesante... de modo que así es como {mf|el|la} gobernante de mundos y todas las estrellas del cielo actúa cuando encuentra a un desdichado al borde de su magnífica órbita». {n}Jae asiente, pensativa, e indica al siguiente solicitante que avance.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「やるわね…立派な軌道の端っこで幸薄い奴を見つけたら、ああやって星と全天を統べる者の振る舞いを見せるのね」{n}ジェイは考え込むようにうなずくと、前方にいる次の嘆願者を手招きで呼び寄せる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Interesting... So that is how the ruler of worlds and all the stars in the sky acts when {mf|he|she} finds an unfortunate on the edge of {mf|his|her} magnificent orbit." {n}Jae nods pensively and beckons the next petitioner forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「やるわね…立派な軌道の端っこで幸薄い奴を見つけたら、ああやって星と全天を統べる者の振る舞いを見せるのね」{n}ジェイは考え込むようにうなずくと、前方にいる次の嘆願者を手招きで呼び寄せる。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Intéressant... C'est donc ainsi que {mf|le maître incontesté|la maîtresse incontestée} de la galaxie réagit lorsqu'{mf|il|elle} croise le chemin d'un malheureux en périphérie de sa glorieuse orbite. » {n}Jae hoche pensivement la tête et fait signe à la personne suivante de s'approcher.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Interesting... So that is how the ruler of worlds and all the stars in the sky acts when {mf|he|she} finds an unfortunate on the edge of {mf|his|her} magnificent orbit." {n}Jae nods pensively and beckons the next petitioner forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Intéressant... C'est donc ainsi que {mf|le maître incontesté|la maîtresse incontestée} de la galaxie réagit lorsqu'{mf|il|elle} croise le chemin d'un malheureux en périphérie de sa glorieuse orbite. » {n}Jae hoche pensivement la tête et fait signe à la personne suivante de s'approcher.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Interessant ... So verhält sich also {mf|der Herrscher|die Herrscherin} über Welten und alle Sterne am Himmel, wenn {mf|er am Rande seines|sie am Rande ihres} gewaltigen Orbits eine unglückliche Seele findet." {n}Jae nickt nachdenklich und winkt die nächste Antragstellerin heran.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Interesting... So that is how the ruler of worlds and all the stars in the sky acts when {mf|he|she} finds an unfortunate on the edge of {mf|his|her} magnificent orbit." {n}Jae nods pensively and beckons the next petitioner forward.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Interessant ... So verhält sich also {mf|der Herrscher|die Herrscherin} über Welten und alle Sterne am Himmel, wenn {mf|er am Rande seines|sie am Rande ihres} gewaltigen Orbits eine unglückliche Seele findet." {n}Jae nickt nachdenklich und winkt die nächste Antragstellerin heran.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "İlginç... Demek ki dünyaları ve göklerdeki yıldızları yönetenler, etraflarındaki talihsizleri görünce böyle yapıyormuş." {n}Jae, düşüncelere dalarak başını sallıyor ve sıradaki müracaatçıyı yaklaşması için çağırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Interesting... So that is how the ruler of worlds and all the stars in the sky acts when {mf|he|she} finds an unfortunate on the edge of {mf|his|her} magnificent orbit." {n}Jae nods pensively and beckons the next petitioner forward.{/n}
